title: Looking for all girls team to join!
body: Hey everybody, my names zoe and im looking for an all girls team on oce, add me ingame and message me preferred position, skype is a must have :)

replies.body: This is a fine thing to do, just make sure not to bait/outsmart too many people.
I added you :) I main supp and adc (although am silver)

Im going to introduce my wife to this game. I think it will be great if she has other female friends in game.
Do you mind if I add you for now? Once she is ready she can add you later.
What sort of Rank are you looking for?
anything really, more of a social thing than a competitive one!
It didn't but someone's gotta point it out.
yeah i get it, its just not like that :)
Well im yet to encounter another female on league, i wouldnt mind being able to skype without being harassed, sorry if it came off that way but thats the angle im working
